sense.name: Emit a whining sound, possibly as the result of movement.
sense.examples: The bullets whined past our ears. My car engine whines every time I speed up. The door whined when I opened it slowly.

sense.name: Complain; talk in a tearful manner.
sense.commentary: Syntax Includes: NP1[agent[human]] WHINE (PP) NP1[agent[human]] WHINE ADVP
sense.examples: Mary whined about her morning. The baby whined and whined until it was finally fed. Stop whining! You are all girly men!
